name: Sky Descent
description:
You are falling from the sky and must avoid being impaled by spiky objects. If you go out of bounds at the top or bottom of the screen it will result in death. movement is pretty typical, A-Left, D-Right and Space for Jump.

I really struggled with this one. I encountered way too many bugs for the simplistic nature of this game but I got it to a pretty playable state. I really wanted to make a character model and evil pigeons but ran out of time.

Even though I felt like pulling my hair out at some points I still had fun and hope to participate in the next jam.
